snippet: The Indian authorities said they killed three antigovernment militants Tuesday after a shootout in the Indian-administered region of Kashmir.
abstract: Indian authorities say three anti-government militants were killed in shootout in Indian-administered region of Kashmir.
lead_paragraph: The Indian authorities said they killed three antigovernment militants Tuesday after a shootout in the Indian-administered region of Kashmir.

headline.main: India: Militants Are Killed in Shootout in Kashmir
headline.print_headline: India: Militants Are Killed in Shootout in Kashmir
